section.name: Release Description 5.0.0c
section.p: This release of the Middleware Program Set is a component of the integrated release (5.0.0c) of the HORIZON System.

The Middleware Program Set is new to the HORIZON System. This program is defined to group all middleware-related modules for the HORIZON System. Our success in the application of middleware technology into the HORIZON System has demonstrated the need of more web-enable service components in the future of HORIZON.

The first module being released with this program set is the Manager module. The Manager module is the successor of the ingest-grails module. Building on capabilities delivered in the last release, this release focuses on improving the overall reliability of the Middleware Services used by the HORIZON System. The service architecture offers simplified and flexible approach for organizing data products from various mission and/or instruments.

The second module being released with this program set is the Inventory Web Service module. This module wraps the Inventory program set with a restful web service. This allows the Inventory program set to be separated from other modules, which increases security (fewer connections, usernames to the datbase) as well as flexibility (single point of Inventory changes, federate the inventory service). 3.2.1 is the initial release of the Inventory web service.

section.name: System Requirements
section.p: The software contained in this program set was developed using Java and will run on any platform with a supported Java Runtime Environment (JRE). The software was specifically developed under Sun Java version 1.7 and has only been tested with this version.

Sun Java Standard Edition (J2SE) 1.7.x

section.name: Installation
section.p: This section details the procedures for installing and configuring the software in this program set.

subsection.name: Manager Installation
subsection.p: The Manager module consists of the RESTful interface to the HORIZON data acquisition and archive service. The installation of this module is covered in the Manager Installation document.

subsection.name: SigEvent Installation
subsection.p: The SigEvent module consists of the RESTful interface to the HORIZON event publish and subscribe system. The installation of this module is covered in the SigEvent Installation document.

subsection.name: Security Installation
subsection.p: The Security module consists of the RESTful interface to the HORIZON service for authentication and authorization system. The installation of this module is covered in the Security Installation document.
